subject.normal: [Issue 66529] Property evaluation doesn't take visibility into account

headers.subject: [Issue 66529] Property evaluation doesn't take visibility into account

body.footer:
------- Additional comments from misterm@netbeans.org Fri Mar 20 16:21:03 +0000
2009 ------- Raising priority for P3 (part of feature does not work). It is quite deceiving
for the developer since any bean-based framework would claim properties don't exist, s/he thinks they do and the IDE
seems to agree with them.
body.para:
The IDE makes such occurences quite common since when use a class that doesn't
exist, the hint it provides creates a non-public class.
